meanings: exclusive use, private use, ―하다 use exclusively, be for private use

examples.korean: He was accused of appropriating club funds. 발음듣기 그는 클럽 기금을 전용했다는 비난을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was accused of appropriating club funds. 발음

examples.korean: The hotel has 110 bedrooms, all with private bathrooms. 발음듣기 그 호텔에는 110개의 객실이 있는데 모두 전용 욕실이 딸려 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hotel has 110 bedrooms, all with private bathrooms. 발음

examples.korean: dishonest appropriation of property 발음듣기 정직하지 못한 자산 전용 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
The hotel has exclusive access to the beach. 발음듣기 그 호텔은 전용 해안 접근로가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hotel has exclusive access to the beach. 발음

examples.korean: All rooms have private facilities. 발음듣기 모든 객실에는 전용 시설[개별 욕실]이 되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All rooms have private facilities. 발음
